content.question: What is the magnitude of the net gravitational force on Sphere <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi> </math> due to the other two spheres?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 G times m squared, and denominator 9 times r squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator G times m squared, and denominator r squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 11 G times m squared, and denominator 9 times r squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 G times m squared, and denominator 2 times r squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
